name: part_009
file: tmp_【#2ETAnniv】 Zeta's Mini 3D Party!【Vestia Zeta ⧸ Hololive ID】 [YOD6oVkRp9E]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: MC section where Zeta encourages the audience to prepare for the final song.
Closing MC section where Zeta thanks the fans and shares her joy.

subtitles.original: Everyone with me, okay?
subtitles.english: Everyone with me, okay?

subtitles.original: Practice your screaming now. Ah! Ah, ah, ah, ah! Okay.
subtitles.english: Practice your screaming now. Ah! Ah, ah, ah, ah! Okay.

subtitles.original: Okay, I want you guys to prepare your highest voice, okay?
subtitles.english: Okay, I want you guys to prepare your highest voice, okay?

subtitles.original: Let's go! Let's go! I want you guys to scream as loud as you can, okay?
subtitles.english: Let's go! Let's go! I want you guys to scream as loud as you can, okay?

subtitles.original: Because this is the last song! Wooh! Let's go!
subtitles.english: Because this is the last song! Wooh! Let's go!

subtitles.original: Let's end it with a bang! Duru-ru-ru, pom-pom-pom-pom!
subtitles.english: Let's end it with a bang! Duru-ru-ru, pom-pom-pom-pom!

subtitles.original:
思い出すのは 君の歌
歌い笑う 顔が鮮明だ
どこに行ってしまったの
subtitles.english:
What I remember is your song
The face that sings and laughs is vivid
Where have you gone?

subtitles.original: Kaijuu no Hanauta (怪獣の花唄) / Vaundy
subtitles.english: Monster's Song / Vaundy

subtitles.original: いつも探すんだよ
subtitles.english: I'm always looking for it.

subtitles.original:
思い出すのは 君の歌
歌い笑う 顔が鮮明だ
君に似合うんだよ
subtitles.english:
What I remember is your song
The face that sings and laughs is vivid
It suits you well.

subtitles.original: ずっと見ていたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to watch you forever.

subtitles.original:
でも最後に 見たいのは
きっともう 君の夢の中
もう一度
subtitles.english:
But in the end, what I want to see
Is probably already in your dreams
Once more

subtitles.original:
また聴かせてくれよ
聴きたいんだ
subtitles.english:
Please let me hear it again
I want to hear it

subtitles.original:
もっと騒げ怪獣の歌
まだ消えない 夢の歌となれ
subtitles.english:
Make more noise, monster's song
The dream song that hasn't faded away yet, become the song

subtitles.original:
君がいつも 歌う怪獣の歌
まだ消えない 口ずさんでしまうよ
subtitles.english:
The monster's song you always sing
I end up humming it, it hasn't faded yet

subtitles.original:
思い出すのは 君がいた
ギター持てる 君がいた
subtitles.english:
What I remember is that you were there
You were there with a guitar

subtitles.original:
忘れられないんだよ
だったら僕が歌うよ
subtitles.english:
I can't forget
If that's the case, I'll sing

subtitles.original:
でも最後に 見たいのは
きっともう 君の夢の中
もう一度
subtitles.english:
But in the end, what I want to see
Is probably already in your dreams
Once more

subtitles.original:
また聴かせてくれよ
聴きたいんだ
subtitles.english:
Please let me hear it again
I want to hear it

subtitles.original:
もっと騒げ怪獣の歌
まだ消えない 夢の歌となれ
subtitles.english:
Make more noise, monster's song
The dream song that hasn't faded away yet, become the song

subtitles.original:
君がいつも 歌う怪獣の歌
まだ消えない 口ずさんでしまうよ
subtitles.english:
The monster's song you always sing
I end up humming it, it hasn't faded yet

subtitles.original:
落ちていく 過去は鮮明で
見せたい 未来は繊細で
subtitles.english:
The falling past is vivid
The future I want to show is delicate

subtitles.original: 過ぎていく 日々には鈍感な君へ
subtitles.english: To you, who are insensitive to the passing days

subtitles.original:
落ちていく 過去は鮮明で
見せたい 未来は繊細で
subtitles.english:
The falling past is vivid
The future I want to show is delicate

subtitles.original: 過ぎていく 日々には鈍感な君へ
subtitles.english: To you, who are insensitive to the passing days

subtitles.original:
ねぇ もっと騒げ怪獣の歌
まだ消えない 夢の歌となれ
subtitles.english:
Hey, make more noise, monster's song
The dream song that hasn't faded away yet, become the song

subtitles.original:
君がいつも 歌う怪獣の歌
まだ消えない 口ずさんでしまうよ
subtitles.english:
The monster's song you always sing
I end up humming it, it hasn't faded yet

subtitles.original: 眠れない 夜に 手を伸ばして
subtitles.english: Stretching out hands into the sleepless night

subtitles.original: 眠れない 夜に また伸ばして
subtitles.english: Stretching out hands again into the sleepless night

subtitles.original: そんな日々でいたいのに
subtitles.english: Even though I want to stay in such days

subtitles.original: 懲りずに 手を伸ばして
subtitles.english: Without learning, stretching out hands

subtitles.original:
眠れない 夜に また伸ばして
そんな夜に 歌う怪獣の歌
subtitles.english:
Stretching out hands again into the sleepless night
The monster's song sung on such a night

subtitles.original: Yay! How was it? Did you guys enjoy the performance?
subtitles.english: Yay! How was it? Did you guys enjoy the performance?

subtitles.original: Hehe, fantastic side eye in this. I hope you guys liked it!
subtitles.english: Hehe, fantastic side eye in this. I hope you guys liked it!

subtitles.original: I enjoyed it as well! I've always wanted to do a mini-live,
subtitles.english: I enjoyed it as well! I've always wanted to do a mini-live,

subtitles.original: so it's a dream come true that I get to do a mini-live for you.
subtitles.english: so it's a dream come true that I get to do a mini-live for you.

subtitles.original: And, uh, I have Basil with me, I have you guys with me,
subtitles.english: And, uh, I have Basil with me, I have you guys with me,

subtitles.original: although you guys are behind those screens in front of me, it's okay.
subtitles.english: although you guys are behind those screens in front of me, it's okay.

subtitles.original: Uh, I had so much fun! Thank you for staying with me for the past two years!
subtitles.english: Uh, I had so much fun! Thank you for staying with me for the past two years!
